component.name: Tipitaka Pali Reader
component.summary: This is an app to read the Theravāda Buddhist Tipitaka Pāḷi texts. It allows one to click on words and get definitions effortlessly.

description.p: This is an app to read the Theravāda Buddhist Tipitaka Pāḷi texts. It allows one to click on words and get definitions effortlessly. Other reading features like bookmarks, notes, and opening books are also included. You can also install extensions to allow you to read pāḷi and english together at the same time (line by line)
You can watch videos on how to use this at https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMKjBJT7vMjyWt8RU4lpiDg
